item.title: My Certificates
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Organization Course/Certificate Badge Obtained Expiration Certificate AWS AWS Cloud Technical Essentials - - View on Coursera AWS AWS : Migrating to the Cloud - - View on Coursera AWS AWS Fundamentals: Building Serverless Applications - - View on Coursera Linkedin Learning Terraform - - - View on Linkedin Linkedin Continuous Delivery/Continuous Integration - - - View on Linkedin Linkedin Git from Scratch ...GitOps - - - View on Linkedin Organization Course/Certificate Badge Obtained Expiration Certificate DevOps on AWS Learn how to use the combination of DevOps philosophies, practices, and tools to develop, deploy, and maintain applications in the AWS Cloud.

item.title: All My Certificates
item.description: AWS Specialization Certificate Description Verification AWS Cloud Technical Essentials Learn how to use several AWS compute services, including Amazon EC2, AWS Lambda, and Amazon ECS View on Coursera AWS : Migrating to the Cloud Learn how to Migrate to the Cloud. It means moving computer stuff to the internet, which can save money and improve performance. View on Coursera AWS Fundamentals: Building Serverless Applications Learn how to build Serverless applications on AWS.

item.title: NFS Server: A Complete Guide to Setting Up and Configuring
item.description: NFS Setup Guide in 2 minutes by Awais Mustafa

item.title: Little bit About My Website
item.description: Highligthing the result I intend to place the results of various works on this webpage, highlighting the results of mini projects, ongoing projects, and more. So, for those who are reading, thank you! All of the work that I have been doing over the year,and months been extremely fun, eye opening, and a great experience altogether! #comments About Me A little bit about me. I love watching TV; Hopefully, that doesn’t scare you.
